Lists.desc: Fixed In Analysis > Metrics Chart Old, modified the query API not to be called infinitely when selecting the filter.
Feature In Dashboard > Application Dashboard, added the option to select the 7-day prior comparison date into the Today's TPS and Today's visits widgets.
Feature In Instance Performance Management > Opened Socket Count, added the feature description at the top.
Feature In the Table view tab of the Trace analysis window, added the stack information in the method step.

Fixed In the Multi transaction tab and Multiple Transaction Trace menu inside the Trace analysis window, fixed the issue where the content appears truncated when the internal data of individual nodes in the multi-transaction chart is long.
Fixed In the Trace analysis window, fixed the issue where some data in Methods, SQLs, and HTTP calls is not displayed.
Fixed In the Trace analysis window, fixed the issue where text is not downloaded in Methods, SQLs, and HTTP calls.
Fixed Fixed the white issue when viewing the Russian map in the Dashboard > Browser Monitoring Dashboard > Page Load Count Map widget.
Fixed In Dashboard > Resource board, fixed the issue where the server status on the server status card at the top and the hive chart, does not match to the server list.
Fixed In Server List > Server Detail, modified to exclude NAS or S3 disk capacity when calculating Disk Total on the upper right.

Fixed In the Multi transaction tab and Multiple Transaction Trace menu inside the Trace analysis window, fixed the issue where node clicks do not work when there are multiple starting point transactions.
Fixed Fixed the whiteout issue that occurs when you enter into the APP. > Instance Performance Management > Method Performance menu.
Fixed In Dashboard > Server Inventory Map, modified to update the number of events for each status in the group grid panel.
Changed In Dashboard > Flex Board, modified the Count widget to allow multiple thresholds to be set.
Changed In Dashboard > Flex Board, modified to display the series widgets generated with metrics data in text format.
Changed Applied the border colors to the popover, menu, and dropdown elements in the dark theme.
Changed In Alert > Event History, added event status fields and expanded the event status types.
Fixed Modified the widget sorting method in Flex Board.
Fixed In Analysis > Metrics Chart Old, fixed the issue where the time zone movement buttons to the left and right inside a specific widget in the chart do not work.
Fixed Modified the sorting method of the Webhook JSON configuration form in Alert.
Fixed In My Usage > Billing History, fixed the issue where table columns are not sorted properly.
Fixed Fixed the issue where some reports are not generated when generating reports after multiple agents are selected.
Fixed Fixed the issue where the View resolved events switch UI does not appear when there is no data in the notification list widget of the Integrated Flex Board or Flex Board menu.
Fixed Applied the tooltips for Invalid tag displayed in the event list of the Alert > Event Configuration menu and multi languages.
Fixed In the Avoids a large number of alerts section of the Alert > Notifications menu, modified to display the SMS blocking thresholds depending on the configuration.
Fixed Fixed the issue where the changed time is not applied when the time is changed using the keyboard in the time selector.
Fixed Applied multi languages to the message displayed when changing the time selector to real-time mode.
Feature In Dashboard > Application Dashboard, added the WhaTap Docs link to the Concurrent user widget guide.
Feature In the project selection filter of the Analysis > Multiple Transaction Trace menu, modified to always expose the current project at the top.
Feature Added the auto-scrolling feature to the selected agent when there is information about the agent while entering into the Instance Performance Management menu for the first time.
Changed In the Multi transaction tab and the Multiple Transaction Trace menu inside the Trace analysis window, improved the display of calling order when Table view is selected.
Changed In the Multi transaction tab and the Multiple Transaction Trace menu inside the Trace analysis window, modified the UI.
Lists.details:
• Separated MTID, date, and search button at the top in the search area and added the enter event to the MTID input box.

  • Modified the pcode and platform icon positions among the project list items when selecting a project.

  • Displayed the total number of selections in the Select All checkbox text when selecting projects.

  • Changed the overall selection method to a switch-based selection when selecting projects.

  • Changed the style of the option buttons and modified the position of the guidance text in the chart tab area.

  • Changed the node style in the chart area, added the platform icon, and modified the positions for application name and project name.

Lists.desc: Changed In Topology > APP. Topology, increased the width of the search input box.
Changed Changed not to display the Statistics button when the Statistics > SQL menu has no transaction hash to be connected.
Changed In the menus under Instance Performance Management, increased the width of the search input box.
Changed In Topology > APP. Topology, changed the time selector and agent selector.
Changed In Sitemap > Topology > Instance Topology, changed the time selector and agent selector.
Fixed In Topology > APP. Topology, removed the agent node selecting option.
Fixed Fixed the issue where the Instance Performance Management > Method Performance reset button does not work.

Fixed In the Multi transaction tab and Analysis > Multiple Transaction Trace menu of Trace analysis, fixed the issue where the Display Detail drawer is disabled when individual nodes are clicked in the multi-transaction chart.
Fixed In Instance Performance Management > Agent Log, fixed the issue where the log file is viewed before viewing the log list.

Fixed In the Multi transaction tab inside the Trace analysis window, fixed the issue where clicking the agent name in the record summary after selecting a node from another project goes to the environment variable page of the initial project, not the selected project.
Fixed In Dashboard > Application Dashboard, modified some styles in the agent selector.
Fixed In Dashboard > Active Transaction, modified the option bar's spacing style.

Fixed In the Multi transaction tab and the Multiple Transaction Trace menu inside the Trace analysis window, fixed the issue where the transaction call order is displayed in reverse when Table view is selected.
Fixed In sub menus under Analysis, fixed unthemed elements in the agent selector.
Fixed In Analysis > Stack, fixed the elements that do not have theme colors applied.
Fixed In Instance Performance Management > DataSource Status, modified the height and style of the search bar and button to be matched.
Fixed In Statistics > Transaction, fixed the issue where the displayed date at the top of the pop-up window is not changed when using the Trend comparison feature.
Feature In Dashboard > Server Inventory Map, added the overall server selection and deselection feature in the group Display Detail screen.
Feature In Dashboard > Server Inventory Map, added case comparison operator in the conditions when selecting a filter key with a numeric value.
Feature In Dashboard > Server Inventory Map, added the Display no primary group option (enabled by default).
Feature In Dashboard > Server Inventory Map, added the Display the metric area at the bottom of group option (enabled by default).
Feature In Dashboard > Server Inventory Map, added the Label selection option to display on the group panel icon.

Feature Added the Active event status tab in the group summary panel and detailed view of the Dashboard > Server Inventory Map menu to view active events within the past 24 hours based on the current time.
Feature In the detailed view of the Dashboard > Server Inventory Map menu, added the following features.
Lists.details:
• Added the Free(GB) column in the table of the File system usage information.

  • Added the column key with a numeric value in the filter of the File system usage information tab.

Lists.desc: Feature At the top of the Server List > Server Detail menu, added the Disk Total item.
Changed For the support of features in the Dashboard > Server Inventory Map menu, added the agent installation guide for the AIX OS environment.
Changed In the Dashboard > Server Inventory Map > View Detailed > Server Inventory tab, modified to allow case comparison of keys that must act as numeric types when using filters.
Changed In Dashboard > Server Inventory Map, modified to allow case comparison of keys that must act as numeric types when using filters.
Changed Changed the top of the group panel in the Dashboard > Server Inventory Map menu to display the counts by server status for each group and the number of events by status.
Changed In Server List > Server List, improved the server status determination logic.
Lists.details:
• Before: Server status is determined based on only ongoing events.

  • After: Server status is determined considering ongoing events as well as one-time events with the resolved notification option turned off.

Lists.desc: Changed In Server List > Server List, changed the snapshot chart in the modal that appears by clicking the server status icon to display charts for valid event categories.
Fixed In the Server Inventory Map > View Detailed > Server Inventory tab, fixed the issue where the OS icon does not appear properly in the OS type column.
Feature In Cluster > Object Manifest, added the Custom Resource Definition object.
Feature In Management > Agent Installation, added the custom resource-related options to the additional feature application step.
Feature In Management > Agent Installation, added guidance to the activation of the kube-scheduler feature.
Feature In Analysis > Pod Startup Analysis, added the time selection feature.

Feature Added the AvailableRequestCpu and AvailableRequestMemory metrics that are values obtained by subtracting the sum of requested resources for all containers from the allocatable resources on the node.
Lists.details:
• Cluster > Node List

  • In Display Detail of the Workload > Pending Pod Status menu, added the metric that pops up when there are node resource issues.

Lists.desc: Feature In Workload > Container Application List, added the container performance metrics.
Feature In Cluster > Kubernetes Event, provided Suggestions about the “Node is not ready” event.
Feature In Container > Out Of Memory Killed Container, added the microOname column.
Feature In Container > Container Images, added the Image column.
Feature Provided the summary analysis in the detail screen of the following menu.
Lists.details:
• Workload > Container Application List

  • Cluster > Node Detail

  • Cluster > Node List

  • Cluster > Ingress List

  • Cluster > Node Timeline

Lists.desc: Feature Added the Sitemap > Dashboard > GPU Dashboard menu.
Changed In the Container summary analysis and Pod summary analysis features, added information for Service and Ingress and supported the multilingual service.
Changed In Management > Kubernetes Agent List, modified the background color of the Detail tab.
Changed In Cluster > kube-apiserver Dashboard, changed to allow querying data for up to last 6 hours.
Changed In Management > Agent Installation, added Korean instructions for resolving the issue where whatap.server.host in env is not recognized when installing the Docker Java.
Changed In the Cluster > Ingress List and Service List menus, changed the status display icon's text color.
Fixed In Sitemap > Dashboard > GPU Dashboard, fixed the issue where some widget metrics do not appear.
Fixed In Container > Container Images, fixed the repository, name, and tag parsing errors when the image value is provided only as a digest.
Fixed In Cluster > kube-scheduler Dashboard, fixed the issue where the selection state color for tags is not differentiated when using the dark theme.
Fixed In Cluster > Object Manifest, fixed the issue where CronJob is not retrieved.
Fixed In Management > Agent Installation, modified the environment variable name for okind setting in the Docker Node.js installation guide.
Fixed In Dashboard > Container Map, modified the filters applied on the dashboard to remain the same on the detailed view screen.
Fixed In Analysis > Metrics Chart New, fixed the duplicate creation issue when the metric labels are the same.
Deprecated In the Comparison window of the Cluster > Node List menu, removed the tabs other than Metrics.
Feature In Analysis > Database Parameter, added the CSV downloading feature and the searching feature for the results based on the key value.
Feature In Analysis > Lock Tree, added the 1-minute chart.
Feature In Dashboard > Monitoring Multiple Instances, added the Alarm State widget.
Feature In Dashboard > Monitoring a Database Instance, added the instance status displaying feature in the instance selector.
Feature In Management > Agent List, added the link to the Monitoring a Database Instance menu when the agent name is clicked.
Changed In Stat/Report > SQL Statistics, changed the text on the CSV download button.
Changed In Dashboard > Instance List, changed the following when there are no agents to monitor.
Lists.details:
• Fixed the table list to display the message that the agent is not installed.

  • Changed not to go to the Management > Agent Installation menu.

Lists.desc: Fixed Fixed the issue where the text on the Cancel button in the Session kill popup window overflows beyond the button area when the language setting is Japanese.
Fixed In Management > Agent Installation, modified the Windows running command.
Feature In Stat/Report > Tablespace Size, added several features.
Lists.details:
• Added the table to check the disk usage when configuring the XOS.

  • Added the column for auto-extension option in the tablespace size detail table.

Lists.desc: Changed Improved the Stat/Report > Tablespace Size menu.
Lists.details:
• Changed the default query period from 1 day to 7 days.

  • Changed to view the segment sizes (Top 50) when the Detail button is clicked.

  • Adjusted the default width of the table column.

  • Changed the default sorting to be based on the usage (%).

  • Changed the tablespace name column to be fixed when scrolling the table left and right.

Lists.desc: Fixed Modified the Stat/Report > Tablespace Size menu.
Lists.details:
• Fixed the issue where the charts appear connected when the chart data is 0.

  • Changed the value to be visible when the table data is 0.

Lists.desc: Feature In Stat/Report > DB size, added the table to check the disk usage when configuring the XOS.
Changed Improved Stat/Report > DB size.
Lists.details:
• Changed the default query period from 1 day to 7 days.

  • Changed to view the table sizes (Top 50) when the Detail button is clicked.

  • Adjusted the default width of the table column.

Lists.desc: Fixed Modified Stat/Report > DB size.
Lists.details:
• Fixed the issue where the charts appear connected when the chart data is 0.

  • Changed the value to be visible when the table data is 0.

Lists.desc: Fixed In Analysis > Lock Tree, changed the lock mode, waiter type, and lock request columns to be left-aligned.
Feature In Stat/Report > Tablespace Size, added the feature to view object details in the segment size (Top 50) drawer.
Fixed In Dashboard > Instance List, fixed the issue where activated instances do not appear.

Fixed Fixed the issue where the active session information is not viewed when the SQL details window is entered through the SQL Elapse Map widget of the Dashboard > Monitoring Multiple Instances menu.
Feature In Analysis > Lock Tree, added the xact_runtime column after runtime and the xact_start column at the end.
Fixed In the list of the Stat/Report > SQL Statistics menu, fixed the issue where the last two digits of the sqlHash value are truncated when the value is negative.
Feature Added 3 Azure templates in the cloud Flex Board template.
Feature Added the Statistics > Error Load Statistics menu.
Feature In Log > Log Trend, added the chart dragging feature and chart area panel's size adjustment feature.
Changed Changed the table cells in the log data list to be left-aligned.
Changed In the Log > Log Configuration > De-identification of personal information tab, modified the form spacing in the Log's personal information de-identification checking panel.
Fixed In Log > Log Trend, fixed the issue where the background color of the selected area does not appear when the chart is clicked.
Fixed In Log > Log Trend, fixed the issue where the initial value is changed to the selected time when changing the time in the time selector of the log list.
